com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking

Interface PrepareCheckCallback

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CorrectionDialogCheckSession, DocumentSession, InlineCheckSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentSessionImpl, OnlyDocumentProvidingTextPrepareCheckCallback, TextPrepareCheckCallback

    public interface PrepareCheckCallback
    The interface PrepareCheckCallback defines the methods which must be implemented to prepare a check. See CheckInformation. Also it has a callback for removing all flags before a new check is performed. See removeMarkings().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PrepareCheckCallback NULL
      The Constant NULL is the null object singleton for PrepareCheckCallback.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CheckInformation extractCheckInformation(AcrolinxFactory factory, ClientSettings clientSettings, CheckCapabilities checkCapabilities)
      Extract the text from your integration-specific text source and create a Document by using the given AcrolinxFactory.
      void removeMarkings()
      This method removes the markings from the document.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final PrepareCheckCallback NULL
        The Constant NULL is the null object singleton for PrepareCheckCallback.

    • Method Detail

      • extractCheckInformation

        CheckInformation extractCheckInformation(AcrolinxFactory factory,
                                       ClientSettings clientSettings,
                                       CheckCapabilities checkCapabilities)
        Extract the text from your integration-specific text source and create a Document by using the given AcrolinxFactory. See AcrolinxFactory.documents().
        Example:
        return factory.getStringDocument(yourTextBox.getText());
        Parameters:
        factory - the AcrolinxFactory which can be used to create the document
        clientSettings -
        checkCapabilities -
        Returns:
        the CheckInformation containing a Document which contains the text to be checked

      • removeMarkings

        void removeMarkings()
        This method removes the markings from the document. This callback is called before extractCheckInformation(AcrolinxFactory, ClientSettings, CheckCapabilities). Markings should be removed to not send any styling information belonging to the markings to the Acrolinx Server.
        If you only use the corrections dialog box this method does not have to do anything. Note: If you do an inline check you could use the InlineCheckDocumentSessionController.
